name: Hex Rally
description:
Hex Rally is a top down drift game (prototype) with kind of a helicopter view and randomly generated tracks

Game Modes (to be implemented):

  • Arcade: Drive 4 stages with difficulty and different biomes with timer checkpoints

 

  • Original mode: Race like arcade mode but with 4 randomly generated stages. Also input or save seed to replay

 

  • Infinite mode: Race constantly generated track with hexagon pieces building in front of the car. Score the most hexagons possible within limit

 

  • Network track: 4 player online with some AI cars a predefined track
